long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: This extension sends the text you select into Lingolette's scratchpad via a context menu item. The scratchpad allows you to see translation, perform lemma analysis, add to your own vocabulary, listen to its pronunciation. For English language pronunciation analysis is also available. For several languages with non-Latin script optional transliteration is present.
